entry.title: [RBX1][Network] - Migrating network equipments in 2 steps
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 7, 19:00 UTC  -  Jun 9, 02:00 UTC

Jun 2, 08:56 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of the end-of-life process,
we will be migrating some network devices in end-of-life to new infrastructure in order to improve our reliability.
This operation will handled in 2 steps to avoid any outage.
Step 1 : From 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 08/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Step 2 : From 08/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC

entry.title: [BHS][Infrastructure] Multiple rack impacted
entry.content:
Jun 1, 12:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 1, 11:12 UTC
Identified - Due to the maintenance https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ynn1j4z1br7p, several servers in those racks are impacted
Start time : 1/06/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 1/06/2023 12h50 UTC
Service impact : :Rack T04A17 T04B23 T04B18 T04B26 T04A18 T05A22 T05A35 T05A32 T05B35 T05C24 T05E32 T05G24 T05C33 T05E09 T05A34 T05B24 T05A02 T05B27 T05A28 T05B33 T05A15 T05D25 T05F02 T05D23 T05E22 T04C31
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA1][DedicatedServers] - Racks G116B02, G116B03, G116B04, G116B05, G116B06, G116B07, G116B08, G116B09, G116B12, G116B11, G116B13, G116B14
entry.content:
Jun 1, 03:36 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 31/05/2023 21:52 UTC
End Time : 01/06/2023 03:34 UTC
Root cause : Cooling malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 1, 02:42 UTC
Update - There is very few impacted servers impacted still.
Our technical teams continue to work on it.

Jun 1, 00:15 UTC
Identified - Most of the impacted servers are back online.
Our technical teams are hands on the remaining ones.

May 31, 22:07 UTC
Update - Further investigation spotted impact for racks G116B02, G116B03, G116B04, G116B05, G116B06, G116B07, G116B08, G116B09, G116B12, G116B11, G116B13, G116B14

May 31, 21:58 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/05/2023 21:52 UTC
Service impact : Public network is down.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: [RBX/GRA][Baremetal] - Network equipment maintenance
entry.content:
May 31, 20:09 UTC
Completed - The mainteance wont be completd in scheduled tim.
It has beenpostponed and will be reschedule.
A new post will be created when the new shedule has been validated.

May 31, 19:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 27, 18:46 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 31/05/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 01/06/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be upgrading the version of a network equipment.
